survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the experiences and satisfaction levels of commuters using electric bicycles for daily travel.

questions.question_text: How often do you use an electric bicycle for commuting?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to easily categorize frequency of usage.

script.question_text: How often do you use an electric bicycle for commuting?

questions.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to use an electric bicycle for commuting? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 response is not 'Never'.
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to capture multiple influencing factors.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with an 'Other' option as open-ended.

script.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to use an electric bicycle for commuting? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 response is not 'Never'.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the battery life of your electric bicycle?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 response is not 'Never'.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the battery life of your electric bicycle?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 response is not 'Never'.

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using an electric bicycle for commuting?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 response is not 'Never'.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback on challenges.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: text area for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using an electric bicycle for commuting?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 response is not 'Never'.

questions.question_text: Would you recommend using an electric bicycle for commuting to others?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 response is not 'Never'.
questions.client_notes: Simple single-choice question to measure recommendation likelihood.

script.question_text: Would you recommend using an electric bicycle for commuting to others?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 response is not 'Never'.
